masthead.headline: Welcome to our lab
masthead.introduction: We are digital artisans and passionate software craftsmen fueled by caffeine. We are obsessed in figuring out the best solutions that clients need. We are the catalyst that your idea needs. Let's build it.

features.title: Technical Excellence
features.description: At our lab, we pride ourselves with excellence mindset. We strive to know the in's-and-out's of whatever technology we're using, resulting to quality output. We adhere to the Software craftsmanship manifesto as our credo.

features.title: Innovative Ideas
features.description: Innovation is in our blood. When we're not working, we're innovating, fiddling with new software and hardware technologies, building stuff. This innovation habit will reflect back into our work and services that we provide you.

features.title: User-oriented
features.description: Ultimately, your product ends up on your users - their experience on the product will be their impression on you and your business. Our work finds the right balance between what your user needs, and what we and you think they need.

services.title: Software Development
services.description: Delivering your needs and exceeding your expections is our success. The lab is fully-equipped with technologies and creativity that will surely provide you the best yet cost-efficient Desktop, Web or Mobile applications.

services.title: Database Design and Optimization
services.description: Service availability relies on data availability so as data availability relies on the backend architecture of an application. So we provide an engineered DB design that is normalized and optimized.

services.title: Computer Networking
services.description: The laboratory is here to deliver a network design that best suits your workplace. Security, Reliability, and Availabilty are on top of our priority in providing you a converged network.

services.title: UI/UX Design
services.description: Form complimenting function. We design interface that highlights your niche and includes strategic content architecture. It is also our duty to comply with the industry standards while modernizing your interface and experience.

services.title: Trainings & Tutorials
services.description: Learning is our passion and we love to share it with you. This will equip you with the essential knowledge in facing the high IT demand of the industry.

services.title: Consulting
services.description: Have any problems or uncertainties? The lab is here to help you. It was built to provide you the optimum solution to your impediments.
